Title: Raise to Power
Description: You need to recursively raise a number to a power and take 4 digits after the decimal point and return them in a list

Title: Factorial
Description: We need to return the factorial of the number n

Title: Fibonacci
Description: Need to return the nth Fibonacci number

Title: Prime Numbers
Description: Need to check if number is prime

Title: Palindrome
Description: Need to check if the string is a palindrome

Title: Sequence
Description: You need to return a sequence where n occurs n times
